Description: Mean fruit mass on 100 randomly sampled berries.
Biennial Bearing Index of total yield.
Units: $100\\% \\times \\Bigg| \\frac{TY\\ difference\\ between\\ successive\\ harvests}{TY\\ sum\\ between\\ successive\\ harvests} \\Bigg|$

Description: Berry length digital measure (major axis diameter of berry contour)
Berry width digital measure (minor axis diameter of berry contour)
A value of 0 represents a perfect circle and a value of 1 represents an ellipse stretched infinitely long (straight line).
Ratio of berry length to width (major/minor axis lengths).
Moderate-to-high correlation with LvW and EC.
Moderate-to-low correlation with LvW and EC.
